summary: The diff implements a comprehensive dashboard redesign with modern card components, updated color scheme (blue/slate theme), refined layout grid, and enhanced sidebar navigation. All major requirements appear to be addressed with evidence in multiple files.

hallucinated_features.description: Added BorderBeam animated light-trail border effect component
hallucinated_features.reason: BorderBeam.tsx component and its integration in BentoCard.tsx were not requested in the BuildRequest. The request focused on matching the reference application's visual style, not adding new animation effects.
